column4: I installed kubuntu 9.10 last night and it was all working. Today, for some reason, I am unable to play any video format. Except for youtube, none of my offline video files are being played. Any ideas?
somewhat similar to my issue.  mp3s wont play in rhythmbox but will in other apps.  i agree w/ n8tuser, try another app.
I tried Dragon player, but it didn't work either. I think there should be something wrong with my codec packs.
